name: Kooky Coder
tagline: It's Not Just Business It's Passion
description:
Kooky Coder has the hallmarks of productivity, imagination, curiosity, collaboration, respect and innovation and aligns them with clients’ objectives.
Kooky Coder's team has worked with among the many companies to develop strategies and create innovative solutions. Many professional collaborate through different divisions to help its English and American clients become more efficient and achieve their business goals. Our aim is to innovate our clients’ office departments and give the best higher-value services.
Since five years when we began providing solutions to the clients , our experience has deepened to embrace recruitment, IT and software services.
Over various businesses of all sizes in the world trust us to help them run their business. We ensure successful retention and transfer of clients’ process knowledge amongst their team members.
We also work on clients’ servers and as per their reporting tools. We help clients set up job responsibilities, methods to monitor our performance and measure the defined goals. And since Kooky Coder is known for its quick turnaround times, all client issues are dealt with swiftly.
Our clients have access to extensive experience in all facets of digital marketing and technology,
Public Relations
SEO Services
Social Media Marketing
User Experience and Customer
Web Design and Technical Services
READ MORE...
